lead_paragraph: Readers discuss former Mayor Rudolph Giuliani’s comments about chasing away the homeless, “right to shelter” laws and the “medically homeless.”

headline.main: New York City’s Rising Number of Homeless
headline.print_headline: New York City’s Rising Number of Homeless

snippet: Readers discuss former Mayor Rudolph Giuliani’s comments about chasing away the homeless, “right to shelter” laws and the “medically homeless.”
